newsitem.title: CHINA: China Jan-Sept aluminium imports up 9.1 pct.
newsitem.headline: China Jan-Sept aluminium imports up 9.1 pct.

text.p: China's imports of unwrought aluminium and aluminium materials reached 476,929 tonnes in the first nine months, up 9.1 percent from the year-ago period, the China Securities newspaper said on Saturday.
Imports of unwrought aluminium and aluminium materials in September alone reached 52,801 tonnes, the newspaper said. It gave no comparative figures for September.
China's imports of unwrought aluminium, including alloys, rose 1.6 percent to 279,590 tonnes in the first nine months compared with the same period last year.
Imports of unwrought aluminium, including alloys, were 31,133 tonnes in September.
Imports of alumina were 820,000 tonnes in the first nine months, up 3.2 percent from the 1995 period.
China exported 105,882 tonnes of unwrought aluminium and aluminium materials in the first nine months, down 46.7 percent from the year-ago period.
China's exports of unwrought aluminium, including alloys, fell 59 percent to 65,713 tonnes in the first nine months of the year from the year-ago period.
Exports of unwrought aluminium, including alloys, were 10,087 tonnes in September alone.
